Text:
Tier V and up skins.

* Red – Engine, chance of fire
* Blue – Driver
* Yellow – Gun
* Orange – Crew member (commander, loader etc)
* Purple – weak spot (high chance of penetrating armor), tracks
* Light-Blue – weak spot with medium chances of penetrating
* White – Ammo
Do people still waste time on this boring game? I had my fair share of it till it became tedious.
seems so, I just shared this mainly for a friend, but seems some folks have picked it up and seeding.  share and enjoy.
